document.full_text: one person was killed and 200 wounded when yemen security forces attacked protesters in the red sea city of hudaida with live and rubber bullets, tear gas, clubs and daggers, a doctor who treated victims said.
document.title: one dead, 200 wounded in yemen clashes
lines_and_colors: one person was killed and 200 wounded when yemen security forces attacked protesters in the red sea city of hudaida with live and rubber bullets, tear gas, clubs and daggers, a doctor who treated victims said.
